body:
JG was temp banned for using alts to bypass the guild limit, Emerald41 was temp banned for using an alt to bypass siege cooldown. 

DF was perma banned for harassing a user across the entire site and Realm_of_stars was banned for threatening to rape a user. 

Klen was perma banned for repeatedly evading temp bans with alts.

Everyone was banned for different reasons, so obviously the length of the ban would be different.

body: Because taking over guilds that aren't yours is much worse than having more than 10 of your own. Frankly the 10 GM limit is stupid and it's just the admins' excuse to say they solved the cabal problem, even though they didn't. They can just spread it out over multiple users and still gm everything notable. Abusively sieging the guilds that aren't theirs is much more important to solidify a monopoly of control over the site.
body_html: Because taking over guilds that aren't yours is much worse than having more than 10 of your own. Frankly the 10 GM limit is stupid and it's just the admins' excuse to say they solved the cabal problem, even though they didn't. They can just spread it out over multiple users and still gm everything notable. Abusively sieging the guilds that aren't theirs is much more important to solidify a monopoly of control over the site.

body:

parent.body:
JG was temp banned for using alts to bypass the guild limit, Emerald41 was temp banned for using an alt to bypass siege cooldown. 

DF was perma banned for harassing a user across the entire site and Realm_of_stars was banned for threatening to rape a user. 

Klen was perma banned for repeatedly evading temp bans with alts.

Everyone was banned for different reasons, so obviously the length of the ban would be different.

Klen was perma banned for repeatedly evading temp bans with alts.

Everyone was banned for different reasons, so obviously the length of the ban would be different.

parent.body: Because taking over guilds that aren't yours is much worse than having more than 10 of your own. Frankly the 10 GM limit is stupid and it's just the admins' excuse to say they solved the cabal problem, even though they didn't. They can just spread it out over multiple users and still gm everything notable. Abusively sieging the guilds that aren't theirs is much more important to solidify a monopoly of control over the site.

body:
Yes because sieging is something that can be quickly reversed by admins, guild creation can't just be deleted and it takes time for people to siege those guilds after the person is banned

If I made an alt and sieged something it takes admins minutes to fix that

If I made an alt and made 10 more guilds it would take 10 siege tokens for someone to take those guilds therefore I have created more damage and more issues
